QuestionText: Find the topology on $X=\{a,b,c,d\}$ generated by the class of subsets $S=\{\{a,b\},\{b,c\},\{d\}\}$
Find the topology on $X=\{a,b,c,d,e\}$ generated by the class of subsets $S=\{\{a,b,c\},\{c,d\},\{d,e\}\}$
Find the topology on $X=\{a,b,c,d,f\}$ generated by the class of subsets $S=\{\{a,b,c\},\{c,d\},\{a\}\}$
Consider the discrete topology on $X=\{a,b,c,d,e\}$. Find a subbase $\mathbb{S}$ for the discrete topology such that it does not contain any singleton sets
